choose.when: SELECT BOOK_NO, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_CONTENT, BOOK_COVER, BOOK_WRITER, COMPANY_NAME, BOOK_TALT, BOOK_PRICE, BOOK_PAGE_COUNT, BOOK_YN, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') AS INSERT_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOOK_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS BOOK_DATE, COUNT(BOOK_NO) AS BOOK_COUNT, PREFERENCE_NO, CATEGORY_NO FROM BOOK LEFT JOIN BOOK_PREFERENCE USING(BOOK_NO) LEFT JOIN BOOK_CATEGORY USING(BOOK_NO) GROUP BY BOOK_NO, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_CONTENT, BOOK_COVER, BOOK_WRITER, COMPANY_NAME, BOOK_TALT, BOOK_PRICE, BOOK_PAGE_COUNT, BOOK_YN, BOOK_DATE, PREFERENCE_NO, CATEGORY_NO, INSERT_DATE ORDER BY BOOK_YN, INSERT_DATE DESC

SELECT BOOK_NO, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_CONTENT, BOOK_COVER, BOOK_WRITER, COMPANY_NAME, BOOK_TALT, BOOK_PRICE, BOOK_PAGE_COUNT, BOOK_YN, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') AS INSERT_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOOK_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS BOOK_DATE, COUNT(BOOK_NO) AS BOOK_COUNT, PREFERENCE_NO, CATEGORY_NO FROM BOOK LEFT JOIN BOOK_PREFERENCE USING(BOOK_NO) LEFT JOIN BOOK_CATEGORY USING(BOOK_NO) WHERE COMPANY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{text}||'%' GROUP BY BOOK_NO, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_CONTENT, BOOK_COVER, BOOK_WRITER, COMPANY_NAME, BOOK_TALT, BOOK_PRICE, BOOK_PAGE_COUNT, BOOK_YN, BOOK_DATE, PREFERENCE_NO, CATEGORY_NO, INSERT_DATE ORDER BY BOOK_YN, INSERT_DATE DESC

mapper.update: UPDATE "BOOK" SET BOOK_YN = DECODE(BOOK_YN, 'Y', 'N', 'Y'), INSERT_DATE = CURRENT_DATE WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
